sum_bart: CRISIL ESG Ratings & Analytic is an independent ratings agency based in Mumbai, India. CRISIL is a member of the FTSE 100, the CSE, the NSE and the BSE. The rating agency was established by the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) in 1968.
sum_peg: Dear Sirs,ursuant to Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that Larsen Toubro Limited has been assigned an ESG rating of "Strong" by CRISIL Analytics Limited.
